original_title: Fabrice Luchini : des écrivains parlent d'argent
overview: For the first time on television, Fabrice Luchini, the one-man band, in turn actor, despiser and worshiper of literature, has agreed to leave an audiovisual trace of his famous solos on stage, which he distills with unfailing success. for over 25 years. A television event!
tagline: Fabrice Luchini makes the great authors speak!
title: Fabrice Luchini : des écrivains parlent d'argent
